text: Marvel Luciel Rea (November 9, 1901 â€“ June 17, 1937) was an American actress. She performed in silent movies. She was also a comedian. Rea was born in Nebraska. She died in June 1937, aged 35 after poisoning herself with ant paste. Category:Suicides Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Nebraska Category:1901 births Category:1937 deaths
title: Marvel Rea
